evidence.claim: Monarch Hospice mentions compliance with HIPAA which indicates their data handling.
The company recognizes the importance of EHR and interoperability standards like FHIR and HL7.
References to X12 transaction sets indicate their involvement in healthcare data exchanges.
The technology strategy includes elements that inform about data privacy and security practices under HIPAA.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of sending/receiving X12 transactions or API automation use cases.
